mapper.select: SELECT id AS product_id, name, price, discount_rate, (SELECT url FROM product_image WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND file_path = 'mainImages') AS url FROM product WHERE id = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(user_id, delivery_user_name, phone_number, zipcode, address, request, status, payment, address_detail) VALUES (#{userId}, #{deliveryUserName}, #{phnoeNumber}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{request}, #{status}, #{payment}, #{addressDetail})
INSERT INTO order_product(order_id, product_id, price, amount, discount_rate) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{discountRate})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{productId}
